00024 ManyBodyOperator OpSDRadii = {
00025  name : "SDRadii",
00026  rank : 0,
00027  pi : 0,
00028  dim : 3,
00029  size : 3,
00030  par : NULL,
00031  me : calcSDRadii2od
00032 };
00033 
00034 
00035 // do not correct for center of mass
00036 static void ob_radii2sd(const SlaterDet* Q,
00037           const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00038           const GaussianAux* X, complex double r2[3])
00039 {
00040   complex double mr2;
00041   int A=Q->A, Z=Q->Z, N=Q->N;
00042 
00043   mr2 = (3.0*X->alpha + X->rho2)* X->Q;
00044  
00045   r2[0] += 1.0/A* mr2;
00046   r2[1] += 1.0/Z* (1+G1->xi)/2*  mr2;
00047   r2[2] += 1.0/N* (1-G1->xi)/2* mr2;
00048 }
00049 
00050 
00051 void calcSDRadii2(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00052                   SDRadii* r2)
00053 {
00054   double r2sd[3];
00055   OneBodyOperator op_ob_radii2sd = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_radii2sd};
00056 
00057 
00058   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_radii2sd, r2sd);
00059 
00060   r2->r2m = r2sd[0];
00061   r2->r2p = r2sd[1];
00062   r2->r2n = r2sd[2];
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 void calcSDRadii2od(void* par,
00067                     const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00068                     const SlaterDetAux* X,
00069                     SDRadiiod* r2)
00070 {
00071   complex double r2sd[3];
00072   OneBodyOperator op_ob_radii2sd = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_radii2sd};
00073 
00074   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_radii2sd, r2sd);
00075 
00076   r2->r2m = r2sd[0];
00077   r2->r2p = r2sd[1];
00078   r2->r2n = r2sd[2];
00079 }

00082 void writeprojectedSDRadii(FILE* fp,
00083                            const SlaterDet* Q,
00084                            const Projection* P,
00085                            SDRadiiod** sdradii,
00086                             const Eigenstates* E)
00087 {
00088   int odd=P->odd;
00089   int jmax=P->jmax;
00090 
00091   int p,j,i,n;
00092 
00093   char prefix[8];
00094 
00095   SDRadiiod* r;
00096   int* idx;
00097   int ngood;
00098   complex double *norm, *H;
00099 
00100   for (p=0; p<=1; p++)
00101     for (j=odd; j<jmax; j=j+2) {
00102       
00103       ngood = E->ngood[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00104 
00105       if (ngood) {
00106 
00107         if(odd) sprintf(prefix, "[%d/2%c]", j, p ? '-' : '+');
00108         else    sprintf(prefix, "[%d%c]", j/2, p ? '-' : '+');
00109 
00110         idx = E->index[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00111         norm = E->norm[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00112         H = E->v[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00113 
00114         r = sdradii[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00115   
00116         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  N      = ", prefix);
00117         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00118           fprintf(fp, "   %8.5f", creal(norm[idx[i]]));
00119         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  H      = ", prefix);
00120         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00121           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", hbc*creal(H[idx[i]]));
00122 
00123         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  Rm     = ", prefix);
00124         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00125           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", sqrt(creal(r[idx[i]].r2m/norm[idx[i]])));
00126         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  Rp     = ", prefix);
00127         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00128           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", sqrt(creal(r[idx[i]].r2p/norm[idx[i]])));
00129         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  Rn     = ", prefix);
00130         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00131           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", sqrt(creal(r[idx[i]].r2n/norm[idx[i]])));
00132         fprintf(fp, "\n%s  Rch    = ", prefix);
00133         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++)
00134           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", sqrt(r2charge(creal(r[idx[i]].r2p/norm[idx[i]]), Q->N, Q->Z)));
00135  
00136        fprintf(fp, "\n");
00137       }
00138     }
00139 }
